sourcesContent:
import { useQuery } from 'react-query' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import GNB from 'routes/_shared/GNB' import { getSearchListApi } from 'services/bookSearchApi' import styles from './bookDetail.module.scss' import { MouseEvent } from 'react' import store from 'store' import { useRecoil } from 'hooks/state' import { cartStoreState } from 'states/cartStoreState' import { HeartIcon, CartIcon } from 'assets/svgs' export interface Props { authors: string[] contents: string datetime: Date isbn: string price: number publisher: string sale_price: number status: string thumbnail: string title: string translators: any[] url: string } const BookDetail = () => { const { paramValue } = useParams() const [, setCartStore] = useRecoil(cartStoreState) const { data, isLoading } = useQuery( ['getSearchListApi', paramValue], () => getSearchListApi(paramValue).then((res) => res.data), { enabled: !!paramValue, } ) const handleClickBtn = (e: MouseEvent) => { const { value } = e.currentTarget.dataset if (!value) return const storeData = store.get(value) if (storeData.length > 0) { const tempData = storeData.filter((item: Props) => item.isbn !== data.documents[0].isbn) store.set(value, [...tempData, data.documents[0]]) } else { store.set(value, [data.documents[0]]) } setCartStore(store.get(value)) } return (
{!isLoading && data ? (
{data.documents[0].title}
{data.documents[0].authors} 저 | {data.documents[0].publisher} 출판 ( {data.documents[0].datetime.split('T')[0].replaceAll('-', '. ')})
판매가 {data.documents[0].sale_price}
작품 소개
{data.documents[0].contents}...더보기
) : (
sdfds
)}
) } export default BookDetail
